=== Summary ===

* Research available upstream software suspend options with the intention to select the most robust and easiest to extend.
* Document solutions found in the homegrown Ubuntu acpi-support scripts.
** Backport the solutions to the selected upstream software.
* Integrate the merged software into feisty+1.
* Develop a software suspend test suite for inclusion on the feisty+1 live CD.

=== Rationale ===

Software Suspend in Ubuntu is a finicky beast. The infrastructure behind it (acpi-support) has been built-up homegrown trial and error.
